name: Mission: Escape from Island 3
description: Mission: Escape from Island 3 - a new episode of great shooter with amazing graphics! Unexpected continuation of the story of the past episode, upgraded graphics, new enemies and weapons, more diverse levels and wonderful effects will not leave you indifferent!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and newer Processor: 2.0+ GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Storage: 280 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated Audio
